Firstly, when the comb plate reaches 200 °C(392°F), the exterior is only50°C(122°F)so that you will not burn your skin. Secondly, it produces anion when in use which removes frizz and also massages your scalp. Also, anion can combine with air to produce moisture that can help nourish your hairWarnings:1. Please check the condition of the product body and cord before use; don\'t use if there is any damage2. This brush has Auto Shut-Off Protection, it will shut down automatically every half an hour, please restart it if you want to use it again.3. Keep out of reach of children4. Keep away from flammable materials5. Wait until cool before storing the product6. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus:** The user is primarily focused on eye care products that enhance the appearance of eyelashes and is increasingly exploring organizational beauty products for effective storage solutions. They have recently expanded their interest to include skincare items, particularly those that address under-eye concerns, alongside hair styling tools.

- **Preferences:** They value high-performing products that condition, protect, and lengthen eyelashes, emphasizing volumizing effects. The user appreciates ease of use in all beauty products, including skincare and organizational solutions, and has demonstrated a willingness to engage with skincare that revitalizes and rejuvenates.

- **Performance Concerns:** Sensitivity to product performance and quality remains strong, especially regarding flaking in eyelash products. They are open to exploring new beauty-related items that offer high functionality and usability.

- **Rating Tendencies:** The user approaches ratings critically, generally averaging around 3.0 but has shown an increased willingness to award higher ratings (such as 5.0) when products exceed their usability and quality expectations. This shift reflects their recent favorable experiences with various beauty items.

- **Experience Expectations:** They maintain high-quality expectations for all beauty and skincare products and are actively seeking effective storage solutions for their beauty tools.

- **Timeframe Engagement:** Engaged with beauty products since 2015, the user's recent activity indicates a diversifying beauty routine and an evolving interest in organization and skincare. 

Overall, they maintain a cautious yet exploratory approach, seeking effective performance, ease of use, quality, and organization in their beauty products.
